name: Jasmine Latendresse
title: PhD Candidate in Software Engineering
bio:
I am a Ph.D. candidate in Software Engineering working under the supervision of Emad Shihab in the DAS Lab at Concordia University in Montreal, Canada. I am also part of CREATE SE4AI, a training program funded by NSERC.

My research interests span software supply chain topics and software engineering for AI (SE4AI). I am currently a research intern at the National Bank of Canada, working on integrating AI in ITSM processes.
